      Deprecated. 
      Please use createFileFromText(String, FileType, CharSequence) instead, since file type detecting by file extension becomes vulnerable when file type mappings are changed.

      • getInstance

        public static PsiFileFactory getInstance(Project project)

      • createFileFromText

        @Deprecated
public abstract PsiFile createFileFromText(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.String text)
                                    throws IncorrectOperationException
        Deprecated. Please use createFileFromText(String, FileType, CharSequence) instead, since file type detecting by file extension becomes vulnerable when file type mappings are changed.
        Creates a file from the specified text.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the file to create (the extension of the name determines the file type).
        text - the text of the file to create.
        Returns:
        the created file.
        Throws:
        IncorrectOperationException - if the file type with specified extension is binary.
